function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of disease among First Nations peoples","Impact":"Increased morbidity and mortality, rapid spread of disease","Mitigation":"Improved monitoring and surveillance, targeted healthcare interventions","Technologies":"Health information systems, telemedicine","People":"First Nations peoples","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"High mobile population and exposure to fly-in fly-out workers","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Strict quarantine measures, travel restrictions, and testing protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote healthcare services","People":"First Nations peoples and fly-in fly-out workers","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in maintaining treatment for chronic conditions, such as access to dialysis","Impact":"Increased risk of complications and mortality for individuals with chronic conditions","Mitigation":"Improved access to healthcare facilities, telemedicine, and home-based care services","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices","People":"First Nations peoples with chronic conditions","Owner":"Health authorities and healthcare providers"}]}
